Text:
I have not thanked you for a long time.So once again I thank you for all your wonderful educational uploads.I really found "Trails of Evidence" very educational although it is not my field.
Any news on "MathtutorDVD Engineering Circuit Analysis Vol.2 ?"
Could you upload "The Skeptic's Guide to American History"?

@indiaman: Sorry, no news on "MathTutorDVD Engineering Circuit Analysis Vol.2" yet.

@varkstun: I'll upload the audio edition of "The Skeptic's Guide to American History" soon (I haven't encountered the video edition yet).
@indiaman: Oh, I see that Engineering Circuit Analysis Vol. 2 and Vol.3  have recently been uploaded and I'll try to share them here soon.

@indiaman: Oops. It looks like the torrent containing "Engineering Circuit Analysis - Vol2 and Vol3" has been prematurely removed from the torrent site because it wasn't in compliance with the rules. So I won't be able to download it and share it here. Sorry. I'll keep looking for an alternative copy.
Thanks dohduhdah for keeping me updated on the Mathtutordvd Engg.Circuit Analysis Vol.2&3 upload.I sure hope you find it soon and upload it soon.

@indiaman: It turns out the torrent wasn't removed. The seeder was just temporarily away. Seeding is going very slow however, but I expect to be able to share those engineering circuit analysis tutorials within a week or so, if everything goes ok.
Thank you for a great upload! Cheers.
